Name: Jacob van Heemskerck
Builder: Nederlandsche Scheepsbouw Mij., Amsterdam; completed in British yard
Displacement: 4,150 t (4,084 long tons) standard 4,860 t (4,783 long tons) full load
Propulsion:
2 Parsons geared steam turbines
4 Yarrow boilers
2 shafts
56,000 shp (41,759 kW)
Armament:
10 × 102 mm (4 in) guns (5×2)
8 × 40 mm (4×2)
8 × 20 mm AA cannon
2 × depth charge rails
Armour:
Belt: 2–2.5 in (51–64 mm)
Deck: 1.5 in (38 mm)
